name: proving
desc:
A collection of unit testing tools to help "prove" that your code
works.

name: Fixture
desc:
An abstract base class for test fixtures that can be registered
with the testing lifecycle using the applyFixture(Fixture)
function.

name: setUp
desc: Registers a setUp operation to be executed before each test (in a group).

name: setUpAll
desc: Registers a setUpAll operation to be executed before all tests (in a group).

name: tearDown
desc: Registers a tearDown operation to be executed after each test (in a group).

name: tearDownAll
desc: Registers a tearDownAll operation to be executed after all tests (in a group).

name: TempDirFixture
desc:
A Fixture used to create a temporary directory, which will be created on
setup, and deleted on teardown.

name: directory
desc: The temporary directory (will be deleted after tests).

name: setUp
desc: Creates the temporary directory and exposes it as the directory property.

name: tearDown
desc: Cleans out and deletes the temporary directory.

name: applyFixture
desc:
Registers the provided Fixture with the test lifecycle hooks for the
current group.

name: copyResourceInto
desc:
Copies the test resource at the specified path into the provided Directory as
a File with the same filename as the original.

name: copyResourceTo
desc:
Copies the test resource at the specified path into the provided File,
creating it if necessary.

name: parametizedGroup
desc:
Creates a parametized test group, where each element in args will be passed
to the test function as a separate test run.

name: parametizedTest
desc:
Creates a collection of test calls based on the given test parameters, where
each element in the args list will be passed to a test function as a separate
test run.

name: resourceBytes
desc: Retrieves a test resource, as a the bytes of the file content.

name: resourceDirectory
desc: Retrieves a test resource Directory.

name: resourceFile
desc: Retrieves a test resource, as a File.

name: resourceString
desc: Retrieves a test resource, as a String of the file contents.

name: resourceUri
desc: Retrieves a test resource, as a Uri.

name: templateResource
desc:
Retrieves a String containing the contents of a resource text file with its
template values (surrounded by {{}}) replaced with the provided map values.

name: verifyEqualsAndHashCode
desc:
Verifies (using expect) that the two provided instances, which should be
eqivalent (but not the same instance) are actually equal.

name: verifyToString
desc:
Verifies (using expect) that the result of calling toString() on the given
object is equal to the expected value.

name: verifyToStringMatches
desc:
Verifies (using expect) that the result of calling toString() on the given
object matches the provided matcher.
